text: @SenSchumer We have a Serious Situation with the Coronavirus!The Do Nothing Radical Republicans and the FiveTime Draft Dodger,Far Right Radical trump’s response is a “tax cut for the Rich.”When we watch the pundits they tell us to be afraid of @SenSanders !I’m Not Afraid and Bernies the Man!

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
